title: Dify-Mcp-Server
description: A simple implementation of an MCP server for invoking Dify workflows via MCP tools.
creator: YanxingLiu

DIFY_MCP_SERVER_PATH.description: The file path to the Dify MCP server directory.

CONFIG_PATH.description: The file path to the configuration YAML file that includes dify_base_url and dify_app_sks.
